languages.text: "Я множество лет прожил зрячим, но понял, что слеп все равно, когда не заметил, как мой ученик преступил Завет. Горестен был тот урок. Если смотреть лишь глазами, легко обмануться. Но сердцу солгать невозможно — так я решил. И веки свои запечатал гейсом прозрения. Теперь вижу больше и лучше".

"I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."
languages.original_text: "Я множество лет прожил зрячим, но понял, что слеп все равно, когда не заметил, как мой ученик преступил Завет. Горестен был тот урок. Если смотреть лишь глазами, легко обмануться. Но сердцу солгать невозможно — так я решил. И веки свои запечатал гейсом прозрения. Теперь вижу больше и лучше".

traits.locale_text: "I was sighted for many years of my life, until I realised I was nonetheless blind, after a disciple of mine violated Ahn'shini. It was a bitter lesson. One who looks with one's eyes alone is easily fooled. But the heart cannot be lied to. That was what I concluded. And so I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

"I was sighted for many years of my life, until I realised I was nonetheless blind, after a disciple of mine violated Ahn'shini. It was a bitter lesson. One who looks with one's eyes alone is easily fooled. But the heart cannot be lied to. That was what I concluded. And so I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

"I was sighted for many years of my life, until a disciple of mine violated Ahn'shini and I realised I had been blind all along. It was a bitter lesson. One who looks with one's eyes alone is easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. That was what I concluded. And so I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

"I was sighted for many years of my life, until a disciple of mine violated Ahn'shini and I realised I had been blind all along. It was a bitter lesson. One who looks with one's eyes alone is easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. That was what I concluded. And so I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

"I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. languages.text: "Ich besaß lange Zeit meines Lebens Augenlicht, bis einer meiner Jünger gegen die Grundsätze verstoßen hat und ich erkannte habe, wie blind ich gewesen war. Eine Lektion, wenn auch eine bittere. Wer allein mit den Augen sieht, der ist leicht zu täuschen. Doch das Herz lässt sich nicht belügen. Das ist die Wahrheit, und das war meine Entscheidung. Ich habe meine Augenlider mit einem Geas der Wahren Sicht versiegelt. Nun sehe ich mehr, und besser."
languages.original_text: "I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

traits.locale_text: "Ich besaß lange Zeit meines Lebens Augenlicht, bis einer meiner Jünger gegen die Grundsätze verstoßen hat und ich erkannte habe, wie blind ich gewesen war. Eine Lektion, wenn auch eine bittere. Wer allein mit den Augen sieht, der ist leicht zu täuschen. Doch das Herz lässt sich nicht belügen. Das ist die Wahrheit, und das war meine Entscheidung. Ich habe meine Augenlider mit einem Geas der Wahren Sicht versiegelt. Nun sehe ich mehr, und besser."

languages.text: «Gocé de la visión durante gran parte de mi vida, hasta que un discípulo mío violó la Doctrina y comprendí lo ciego que había estado. Una lección, aunque amarga. Quien solo ve con sus ojos es presa fácil del engaño, pero es imposible mentir al corazón. Tal es la verdad, y tal fue mi decisión. Sellé mis párpados con una Imposición de Visión Verdadera. Ahora veo más, y mejor».
languages.original_text: "I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

traits.locale_text: «Gocé de la visión durante gran parte de mi vida, hasta que un discípulo mío violó la Doctrina y comprendí lo ciego que había estado. Una lección, aunque amarga. Quien solo ve con sus ojos es presa fácil del engaño, pero es imposible mentir al corazón. Tal es la verdad, y tal fue mi decisión. Sellé mis párpados con una Imposición de Visión Verdadera. Ahora veo más, y mejor».

languages.text: 「人生の大半はずっと目が見えていたのだ。弟子が教義に反抗するまでは。苦い教訓だ。目だけで見ていると簡単に騙されるが、心は嘘をつくことはできない。それが真実であり、それが私の選択だった。私は真実の目のギアスで瞼を封じた。今の私は、より多くを、より良く見えている」
languages.original_text: "I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

traits.locale_text: 「人生の大半はずっと目が見えていたのだ。弟子が教義に反抗するまでは。苦い教訓だ。目だけで見ていると簡単に騙されるが、心は嘘をつくことはできない。それが真実であり、それが私の選択だった。私は真実の目のギアスで瞼を封じた。今の私は、より多くを、より良く見えている」

languages.text: “我人生中绝大部分时间，双眼都是完好无损的。然而，直到我的学徒违背了教义时，我才意识到自己一直以来有多么盲目。这是个教训，是个痛苦的教训。只靠眼睛很容易被欺骗，但心灵是无法欺骗的。这是真理，也是我的选择。我用真视的丝线封住了我的双眼。如今，我能看到更多东西，也看得更清楚了。”
languages.original_text: "I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

traits.locale_text: “我人生中绝大部分时间，双眼都是完好无损的。然而，直到我的学徒违背了教义时，我才意识到自己一直以来有多么盲目。这是个教训，是个痛苦的教训。只靠眼睛很容易被欺骗，但心灵是无法欺骗的。这是真理，也是我的选择。我用真视的丝线封住了我的双眼。如今，我能看到更多东西，也看得更清楚了。”

languages.text: « J'ai conservé la vue la majeure partie de ma vie, jusqu'à ce qu'un de mes disciples enfreigne les préceptes et que je prenne conscience de l'aveuglement qui était le mien. Ce fut une leçon des plus cruelles. Regarder avec ses seuls yeux, c'est s'exposer à bien des illusions, mais le cœur, lui, ne trompe pas. Telle est la vérité, et tel a été mon choix. Je me suis cousu les paupières pour atteindre la clairvoyance, et depuis, j'y vois mieux et plus loin que jamais. »
languages.original_text: "I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."

Je me suis cousu les paupières pour atteindre la clairvoyance, et depuis, j'y vois mieux et plus loin que jamais. »

languages.text: "Ömrümün büyük bir kısmını görerek geçirdim. Ardından bir müridimin İlkeleri ihlal ettiğini gördüm ve nasıl da kör olduğumu fark ettim. Dersimi alsam da bedeli acı oldu. Yalnızca gözleriyle bakan biri, kolayca kandırılabilir. Ancak yüreğe yalan işlemez. Hakikat budur, benim seçimim de budur. Göz kapaklarımı Hakiki Görüş İhsanı ile kapattım. Artık daha çok ve daha iyi görüyorum."
languages.original_text: "I was sighted for much of my life, until a disciple of mine violated the Tenets and I realised just how blind I had been. A lesson, but a bitter one. To look with one's eyes alone is to be easily fooled, but the heart cannot be lied to. Such is the truth, and such was my choice. I sealed my eyelids with a Geas of True Sight. Now I see more, and better."
